placeholders.HERO_HEADING_TEXT: Introducing Kitten Mittens: Pawsitively Adorable Paw Protection
placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Keep your feline friend's toes cozy and your furniture scratch-free with our revolutionary Kitten Mittens!
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 PurrfectPaws. Keeping kitties comfy, one paw at a time.
placeholders.NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest Kitten Mittens news, offers, and cute cat content
placeholders.ABOUT_MISSION_STATMENT: Our mission is to provide the most comfortable and adorable paw protection for kittens and cats everywhere
placeholders.ABOUT_VISION_STATEMENT: We envision a world where every cat can strut in style and comfort with their very own pair of Kitten Mittens
placeholders.ABOUT_VALUES_STATEMENT: We value feline comfort, cuteness overload, and bringing joy to both cats and their human companions
placeholders.CONTACT_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Have a question or feedback? We'd love to hear from mew!
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_01_TEXT: Kitten Mittens are adorable, soft mittens designed specifically for cats to keep their paws warm and protected while looking absolutely fabulous
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_02_TEXT: How do I measure my cat's paw size?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_02_TEXT: To measure your cat's paw size, gently press their paw onto a piece of paper and mark the width and length. Refer to our size guide for the purrfect fit!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_03_TEXT: Are Kitten Mittens safe for my cat?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_03_TEXT: Absolutely! Our Kitten Mittens are made from safe, non-toxic materials and designed for comfort. Always supervise your cat when they're wearing their mittens
placeholders.FAQ_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Got questions? We've got answers! Check out our most common queries below
